'''''The Flavor of Déjà Vu''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. This achievement is earned during the quest ''[[The Arrival of the Sabzeruz Festival]].''
<!--
==Gameplay Notes==
-->
==Trivia==
* The Chinese name of this achievement{{lang|zh=负荷口味的既视感|zh_tl=Load Flavor of Déjà Vu}} is a reference to the Japanese animated science fiction film ''{{w|Steins;Gate: The Movie − Load Region of Déjà Vu}}''{{lang|zh=命运石之门 负荷领域的既视感}}.
